subtests.name: X context = new OfflineAudioContext(...) incorrectly threw ReferenceError: "Can't find variable: OfflineAudioContext".
new ConstantSourceNode() threw EcmaScript error TypeError: "undefined is not a constructor (evaluating 'new window[name]()')".
new ConstantSourceNode(1) threw EcmaScript error TypeError: "undefined is not a constructor (evaluating 'new window[name](1)')".
new ConstantSourceNode(context, 42) threw EcmaScript error TypeError: "undefined is not a constructor (evaluating 'new window[name](context, 42)')".
